choicesHtml: produce a critique of how women's bodies are vulnerable to changing social norms
elevate local symbolic and ritualistic practices in depicting divine figures
fabricate an image that recalls craft traditions typically associated with women
make reference to cultural icons that promote diversity, progress, and unity
